summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly lower on Wednesday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Mar. 1
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly lower on Wednesday, with six gaining and the other 13 declining.
Bitcoin rose 1.6% to $23,530 by market close.
